title: Ubisoft to Launch Steep Open Beta in November
content:
A closed early-access beta weekend will run November 10-14. You can try to get a spot in that weekend by registering on the Steep website prior to November 9. A few days later, there'll be an open beta weekend from November 18 to 21, which will be available for any Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC players who want to try out Steep.
Ubisoft's open-world sports Steep combines wingsuits and snowboarding with a massive map that includes Austria's Hohe Tauern mountain range. According to the publisher, other locales like Alaska will be added at a later date as free post-launch content.
